hamudawa bindawattawima:- mehide sidukaranne, ape oththukaruwan yodawa, sathuru pakshaye hamudawa thula durmatha pracharaya kota, sathuru hamudawe chiththa dhairyaya bindahelima, hamudawa thula bheda athikara, owunge satan kirima hakiyawa adapana/wikruthi/hina/ kirimayi.
